Switching User IDs

Use File | Switch User to continue working with an open project database, project, or subproject using a different user name and password. This option is only available if the Administrator has configured the project database, project, or subproject using the Login dialog security option. The switch user feature provides a quick method of switching to a user ID that has different privileges assigned to it without having to close and re-open the project database to login again.

To switch users for a project database:

  1. Select the project database to access under the different user name.

  2. Select File | Switch User or click your user name on the status bar. The Switch User dialog box appears.

  3. Enter the user name and password which has been set up previously for accessing the project database. (You can enter a new user name if the Auto Create Users option was selected when configuring your project database.)

  4. If logging in to a subproject with separate access control, select Remember user name and password for subprojects to retain login information for future access.

  5. Click OK. The new user name appears in the status bar.
